required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: 68Ga-Pentixafor PET/CT for the Subtyping Diagnosis of Primary Aldosteronism: A Prospective Diagnostic Accuracy Study
clinical_study.official_title: 68Ga-Pentixafor PET/CT for the Subtyping Diagnosis of Primary Aldosteronism: A Prospective Diagnostic Accuracy Study

collaborator.agency: The Affiliated Hospital Of Southwest Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the value of 68Ga-Pentixafor PET/CT in the diagnosis of primary aldosteronism subtype

detailed_description.textblock: This is a prospective study. We will enroll 100 patients with definite diagnosis of PA using adrenal venous sampling(AVS) as the gold standard for subtype to evaluate the value of 68Ga-pentixaforPET/CT in the diagnosis of PA.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with PA patients completed 68Ga-PentixaforPET/CT to evaluate its accuracy in diagnosis of PA subtype.
primary_outcome.description: Number of subjects with PA patients completed 68Ga-PentixaforPET/CT to evaluate its accuracy in diagnosis of PA subtype.

arm_group.description: PA confirmatory tests was positive; lateralization index in AVS≥4 or lateralization index 3-4in combination with contralateral suppression index≤1
PA confirmatory tests was positive; lateralization index in AVS<3

intervention.description: ARR、AVS and CT were required for each patient and at least one confirmatory test is required
intervention.other_name: captopril challenge test(CCT) 、seated saline infusion test(SSIT)、fludrocortisone suppression test（FST）; AVS and computed tomography(CT)

study_pop.textblock: A sample of 60 from the positive group and 40 from the negative group achieve 84% power to detect a difference of 0.1500 between the area under the ROC curve (AUC) under the null hypothesis of 0.7000 and an AUC under the alternative hypothesis of 0.8500 using a two-sided z-test at a significance level of 0.05000. The data are discrete (rating scale) responses. The AUC is computed between false positive rates of 0.000 and 1.000. The ratio of the standard deviation of the responses in the negative group to the standard deviation of the responses in the positive group is 1.000.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. PA diagnosis
2. Voluntary to sign on the informed consent and willing to complete all follow-up;
3. Have legal capacity and willingness to surgery
4. AVS succeeded
Exclusion Criteria:
1. AVS failure or indeterminate subtype
2. Pregnant or lactate
3. Malignant tumor
4. Refuse to AVS
5. Complicated with Cushing syndrome
6. Glucocorticoid remediable aldosteronism (GRA) or Liddle syndrome
7. Rejected or intolerant to surgery, such as NYHA class 3 or 4, Severe anemia (Hb<60g/L)、stroke or acute coronary syndrome occurred within 3 months、end stage cirrhosis、eGFR<30ml/min/m2、untreated aneurysms, etc.

facility.name: The First Affilated Hospital of Chongqing Medical University
